bass.without: Quickly create IBAX applications without barriers
bass.creator: You will have the Ecological creator identity:
bass.can: You can also charge ecological currency fees
bass.customize: Customize the number of tokens and issuance methods
bass.naming: Obtain the naming rights of tokens
bass.number: Set the number of tokens to be issued
bass.use: Use smart contracts to maintain ecological stability
bass.one: One-click import Contracts of other chains or:
bass.encourages: The IBAX Foundation encourages individual developers and teams to join the IBAX ecosystem, and will regularly hold ecological evaluation activities to give generous rewards to outstanding ecological applications.
bass.how: How to quickly create ecology and effectively maintain ecology
bass.materials: Materials and videos will help you make better use of the IBAX network
bass.go: Go beyond the pursuit of customer privacy and security
bass.key: The key component of all aspects of IBAX is "Defense in Depth." Guaranteeing customer safety and data privacy is the foundation of cryptocurrency. IBAX deploys a multi-layer security matrix to ensure the safety of customer assets from cyber attacks, internal attacks and human error.
bass.comply: Comply with global privacy security regulations
bass.bank: Use bank-level technology to protect personal information security
bass.attribute: The attribute of decentralization makes it impossible to correspond to the real identity in the blockchain world and protects personal privacy to the utmost extent. In the technical implementation, IBAX adopts homomorphic encryption, asset locking, smart contract zero-knowledge proof, and unreadable secrets. The most advanced cryptography technologies such as key pair (smart contract encryption) cross-chain mechanism and multi-chain isolation ensure the personal safety and privacy of IBAX to the greatest extent.
bass.spire: "Security is the spire of the pyramid, and privacy is the jewel on the spire. We attach more importance to security and privacy than anything else. Only enough attention can ensure the security of the chain, the security of users, and the security of funds. Strictly abide by the international privacy guidelines. The right to privacy is completely in my control."
bass.your: Your safety is our top consideration
bass.symmetric: The elliptical symmetric encryption mechanism based on the blockchain and the HASH encryption mechanism ensure the safety and reliability of the data transmission process. The data results are stored in the IBAX network through HASH mapping, and the change records are clearly visible.
bass.multi: Multi-level encryption to ensure the safety of your personal property
bass.own: IBAX uses public and private keys to encrypt and decrypt signature verification. Only its users can use their own private keys to decrypt, ensuring the security of data and identity. And deposit the encrypted currency into a decentralized wallet, and use multi-party digital signature technology to ensure the safety of your property.
bass.weaver: Weaver supports smart contract files in ABI, Json and other formats, and can quickly import contracts into the ecosystem for use.
bass.panel: Contract panel preview, manage project contracts
bass.provides: Weaver provides ecological contract management functions. You can clearly view all the smart contracts in the ecosystem, allowing you to maintain and expand the ecological content more easily.
bass.always: "Decentralized cross-chains have always been expected by people. Only true cross-chains can allow everyone to realize asset exchange and interoperability without worrying about anyone stealing funds. This is in line with the concept of "distrust" in the blockchain."
bass.cross: The cross-ledger communication node (CLB) in the IBAX network is specially designed for cross-chain. It can flexibly configure CLB performance and deployment according to requirements, without duplication of work, easily obtain external system data, create connections, and process and format data by yourself Conversion.
bass.sets: A true cross-chain communication solution is not only the transmission of digital assets, but also the transmission of rich data sets and smart contract operations between chains, as well as the transmission of dApp-specific data, NFTs, and so on.
bass.solid: A solid foundation for cross-chain data interaction
bass.clb: CLB's unique and innovative contract verification mechanism. When an external system needs to call on-chain contracts to perform on-chain operations, the IBAX public network will verify whether the hash of the contract is correct during and after execution to determine the interactive handshake between off-chain and on-chain It is credible and safe. This method can ensure that there is no risk of tampering in the contract during the interaction.
bass.decentralized: Decentralized cross-chain is not a product of decentralization. It is a real decentralization. It does not require the developer's permission, and without interference from the developer, digital asset transmission, data transmission and intelligence can be carried out between chains. Contract operation. Not only can they enable this feature for themselves, but by deploying CLB, they can also provide cross-chain communication services for other development teams.
bass.improve: Improve transaction efficiency through transaction sharding
bass.transaction: Transaction fragmentation is like different lanes in the same swimming pool, which is an effective way to separate businesses and improve efficiency. In theory, the finer the slice, the higher the execution efficiency, but the situation when a large number of cross-regional businesses appear must also be considered comprehensively, so balance is the most important.
bass.sharding: Sharding according to different business types
bass.shards: The more shards are not the better, you need to adapt to local conditions
bass.prove: Improve communication and synchronization mechanisms through network fragmentation
bass.global: IBAX is the underlying framework of the global blockchain. Due to the network delay caused by different regions, we have fragmented the network and improved the network efficiency through the current honor nodes in the region.
bass.solve: "What we want to solve is not only technical problems, but also product concepts. Only by thinking from the perspective of users can we truly provide valuable platform products.
bass.not: Cross-shard transactions do not affect execution efficiency and performance
bass.whether: Regardless of whether it is network fragmentation or transaction fragmentation, cross-regional transactions are distributed and processed by the transaction processing mechanism through the honor node, which will not affect efficiency and performance.
bass.principle: IBAX adheres to the principle of one chain, and realizes transaction sharding through honor nodes and consensus mechanisms deployed around the world.
bass.closed: Break the closed space of the blockchain
bass.order: In order to ensure the integrity of data, the blockchain sacrifices the possibility of interacting with the outside world. The cross-ledger communication node (CLB) can refer to off-chain data for use in the chain, whether it is asset cross-chain or data cross-chain, it will become a reality.
bass.choices: More data, more choices, and more opportunities
bass.refer: Can refer to any data outside the chain
bass.weather: If weather data, stock market data, geographic information, etc. can be quoted in the chain, and the data on the Internet can be fully utilized, and the decentralized mechanism of the blockchain can be integrated, it will truly change the world.
bass.blockchain: "The blockchain is subject to many limitations. Off-chain data verification has affected the development of the blockchain. The cross-ledger communication node (CLB) is like opening a door to the Internet world. You can use it to achieve any of your idea."
bass.rapid: Rapid deployment of cross-ledger communication nodes (CLB)
bass.there: There is no difference between the deployment of a cross-ledger communication node (CLB) and other nodes. You can deploy it to a computer device by yourself. Under the premise of meeting the cross-ledger communication node (CLB) consensus, you can obtain off-chain data through smart contracts.
bass.with: With ‘verify binding’ function to prevent tampering
bass.when: When the smart contract in CLB does not match the smart contract used for verification on the chain, CLB will no longer execute this contract. The ‘verification binding’ function guarantees and improves the user’s trust in the operation of CLB.
bass.permissions: Use multi-signature to decentralize account permissions
bass.transferring: When transferring funds from a multi-signature account (N), it is necessary to obtain authorization from (M) multi-signature accounts. M+N>51% can complete the transfer.
bass.account: Decentralized account authority is equivalent to decentralized private key
bass.centralized: Avoid centralized authority when multiple parties collaborate
bass.each: Consistency, each account has the same permissions
bass.wallet: Multi-signature wallet prevents private key leakage
bass.insecure: The use of the private key in an insecure environment may cause the private key to be leaked, and the multi-signature wallet will effectively prevent the private key from being leaked by hackers.
bass.concept: "The concept of decentralization is the foundation of the blockchain. Multi-signature technology maintains and applies this concept. This technology can also avoid the problem of centralized authority. The scope of application includes: Defi, exchanges Waiting for business scenarios."
bass.signed: The signed transfer will notify the associated account on the chain
bass.signature: When initiating a signature transfer, the IBAX chain will notify the associated account synchronously, and you do not need to notify the associated account in other ways.
bass.safer: Safer and more reliable than cold wallet
bass.compared: Compared with cold wallets, multi-signature accounts are more secure and reliable. Multiple private keys have flexible storage methods, and decentralized permissions are much safer than centralized management.
bass.anonymous: Anonymous transactions to protect privacy and security
bass.implementation: In the IBAX network, we have designed two implementation methods of zero-knowledge proof of transaction and zero-knowledge proof of smart contract. In all modern blockchain networks driven by smart contracts, only the zero-knowledge proof of smart contracts can guarantee transaction data. Security and privacy.
bass.process: The transaction process cannot be traced
bass.leaked: Personal transaction data will not be leaked
bass.homomorphic: In the IBAX network, we use complex homomorphic encryption technology. Homomorphic encryption is a cryptographic technology based on the computational complexity theory of mathematical problems. It can perform arbitrary calculations on ciphertext data and ensure the accuracy of the results. Only the owner of the data can obtain the data and escort your privacy during the transaction.
bass.since: "Since private transactions make assets safe and uncheckable, high-frequency quantitative transactions between users make them more secure, filling the market demand for anonymous transactions to a certain extent."
bass.financial: The financial federal system is to use a cryptocurrency to get the same amount of cryptocurrency from other people. It allows users to quickly and efficiently mix with other users' funds, between the existing user account and the new account after mixing. The principle of creating a random relationship is to separate the input and output addresses in the transaction, thereby protecting privacy and achieving anonymity.
bass.make: Private transactions make identities more secure
bass.information: In the IBAX network, the information of both parties to the transaction cannot be known through technical means, cannot be tracked and is not affected by real-world identities, and personal safety and privacy are guaranteed. The concealment of identity makes our transaction identity more secure.
bass.safe: In the IBAX network, each account has a "safe", and different assets can be stored in the safe in cipher text. Even after switching accounts, entering the same cipher text can transfer the same assets to the current account and let the identity Concealment and asset conversion are more secure.
market.help: Detailed documentation Help documents help you quickly enrich application content.
market.watch: Watch the BaaS system operation video, understand the content of the system, and know the implementation steps.
market.create: Quickly create an ecosystem and issue coins with one click.
market.each: Each node in the blockchain is public, and it reaches the node through the P2P transmission protocol to realize the mutual transmission of data.
market.multiple: Provide multiple voting templates, including the joint network join template, platform parameter template modification, ecological parameter modification template, token return template, ecological value certification template, and ordinary voting template. Including the template to modify the above template parameters, support custom voting.
market.provide: Provide complete cargo transportation data for the supply chain, accurately record the outbound and in-transit time of commodities, and control the quality of commodity storage. Apply blockchain financial attributes to provide comprehensive blockchain technical services for supply chain finance.
market.the: The decentralized Defi trading market makes your Token free from the risk of currency theft.
market.govern: Eco-members govern together, form a stable community, and decide changes in ecological parameters through voting.
market.display: Display the record of applying to join the federated network. Can be created to join the joint network to apply for voting, decided by the designated role.
market.secure: A secure network based on blockchain communication and encryption mechanisms, a combination of multi-signature and cold wallet technology.
market.chat: View chat records, display all chat records about yourself in the current ecosystem. Initiate a one-on-one chat, the private content will not be known to the outside world. Support group chat function, everyone can speak freely and share each other's views.
market.exist: The existing blockchain is a "self-managed" system. There is still a big gap between the actual "DAO" and the ideal "DAO". The main factor is that external data cannot enter the blockchain. middle. Therefore, cross-chain projects such as "Chainlink" have appeared. The main function of these projects is to connect the data of different data sources outside the chain to the blockchain, realize the execution of conventional data in the chain, and achieve credible data exchange .
market.public: In the IBAX public network, cross-chain/cross-data functions have been completed, and data from different off-chain data sources can be easily and quickly connected to the IBAX network, so as to build a real ecosystem and complete the real world. Blockchainization of production and life in China.
market.has: IBAX has integrated many basic smart contracts and BaaS functions. You only need to refer to the relevant contract to the ecology, or you can complete it through the visual page: one-click currency issuance, ecology management, voting, etc. These functions are greatly reduced The workload of the developer.
market.ia: IA is a cross-chain. What are the available scenarios and what changes can it bring to our lives ?
market.integrate: IBAX's cross-chain uses CLB technology to integrate contract encryption technology to achieve decentralized cross-chain, allowing asset custody and asset locking to be automatically completed through smart contracts. This kind of decentralized cross-chain is the fundamental solution to cross-chain technology.
market.built: Why is the ecosystem built on the IBAX public network highly trusted?
market.one: 1. IBAX Network (IBAX Network) is a highly compatible micro-service and integrated blockchain infrastructure.
market.two: 2. In order to prevent the occurrence of vicious events such as fraud that are common in the existing blockchain world, the IBAX network combines economic theory and scenario requirements to adopt homomorphic encryption, asset locking, smart contract zero-knowledge proof, and technical implementation. The most advanced cryptography technologies such as the cross-chain mechanism and multi-chain isolation of unreadable secret key pairs (smart contract encryption) ensure that the ecological library and ecological group projects on the IBAX network are more fair, transparent, and fraud-free ；
market.three: 3. The consensus level adopts the DPOA upgraded version of the authorized work certification. With the continuous development and growth of the IBAX ecosystem, commercialization will be incorporated into legal supervision to make the ecological reversal more sound.
market.foundation: The IBAX Foundation has created a variety of ecological incentive plans. You can join the corresponding project team according to the team size and application type, and these activities are held regularly on time.
market.heading: Heading
market.want: Want to learn more about events? Go to historical events record.
market.ideas: Realize your wonderful ideas through the IBAX network and provide users with applications that meet their needs. It's not necessarily a big idea, even a small idea that makes people's eyes bright, we will actively encourage it.
market.ecological: Leading the ecological application of future technology
market.development: The development of blockchain technology has never stopped. The IBAX team is still pursuing technological breakthroughs and innovations. We seek like-minded technical teams to build IBAX technical barriers. To this end, the IBAX Foundation will encourage development teams or personnel in a variety of ways.
market.blockchain: IBAX is a blockchain network. We welcome companies, entrepreneurs, groups or individual developers from all over the world to realize your ideas through the IBAX network. We will hold a variety of exciting and rewarding activities for a long time, and we look forward to your participation.
market.order: In order to lower the threshold of IBAX ecological developers and reduce the expenditure of developers, the ecology recognized by the IBAX community will be rewarded by the foundation's IBAX token.
market.have: If you have a wonderful idea but do not have the technical ability to implement it, you can try to contact the IBAX team. After being recognized, the IBAX team will solve all technical problems for you for free.
market.excellent: Excellent projects will definitely get various forms of incentives
market.exploring: The IBAX Foundation is responsible for the operation and development of the IBAX network. It has been exploring outstanding ecological projects. The encouragement for these ecological projects includes funding, technology, promotion, etc. This incentive will be all-round, so that your project can get the best help.
market.based: Jutkey Wallt is a decentralized multi-currency wallet based on the IBAX chain. In the wallet you can add IBAX mining machines to mine, and check the income and status of the mining machines in real time. The mining pool function will be supported in the future, please look forward to it.
market.Weaver: Weaver is an ecological management tool tailored for IBAX developers. You can use Weaver to create ecology, one-click currency issuance, and manage smart contracts.
market.tool: XXX is a decentralized chat tool that is transmitted based on the P2P protocol through IBAX Guardian Node. It has the characteristics of private and visible chat records and will never be cleared.
feature.efficiency: Performance, efficiency and safety are the foundation of IBAX
feature.encryption: On the basis of asymmetric encryption, multiple nested encryption can be realized, and the P2P network can be used to ensure the security of funds and communications.
feature.network: The IBAX network can not only interact with various blockchains and cross-chain assets, but also cooperate with the dedicated node CLB to complete regular CRM data communication interactions.
feature.high: The high storage capacity not only supports the storage of numbers and texts, but also supports the on-chain storage of data in various formats such as pictures and applications. This leaves plenty of room for development for the future expansion of NFT.
feature.we: We believe that the future NFT is not only a picture, but also various forms of data including code.
feature.honor: Honor nodes are the most important part of the IBAX public network. They are responsible for the block packaging of the entire IBAX network and receive packaging rewards. We use a reputation mechanism, which can effectively reduce the impact of failed nodes, so it is called "Honor Node".
feature.any: Any minting node that reaches the scale of comprehensive computing power and meets the total amount of staking (Total Amount of Staking) has the opportunity to become a "honor node". The second prerequisite is the computing power and total amount of staking. (Honor Node)” also needs to meet the hardware index conditions of the server. The IBAX network integrates a hardware monitoring system, which can instantly monitor the hardware operating environment of the honor node.
feature.as: As a witness of ecological data and a store of ecological content, ecological guardian nodes actively request the synchronization of ecological data in the IBAX network.
feature.ecological: The ecological guardian node is a candidate for the Honor Node. When the hardware conditions and pledge conditions are met, it can initiate a vote to become an Honor Node. After the vote is passed, it can become an Honor Node.
home.system: Weaver is a BaaS system based on the IBAX chain. It has many powerful functions. The contract editor is a function tailored for developers, with drag-and-drop effects and contract release and chain functions.
home.basic: IBAX is a basic blockchain framework that can support global complex businesses. It is very important for us to provide good compatibility for developers of other chains.
footer.fast: Fast BaaS system support, one click to complete project release, and provide one click coin issuing function to make your project online easily
footer.blockchain: The self-developed blockchain technology is adopted to ensure that the business information and business data of all links in the supply chain are safe and controllable, from the underlying technologies such as hardware, network, storage, computing, cryptography, consensus and blocking to the business links such as confirmation, circulation, financing and sorting of accounts receivable.
high.low: The current low transaction processing capacity of the blockchain has seriously hindered the development of the blockchain. A high-performance/high-concurrency chain will bring a leap-forward development to the entire blockchain industry. The IBAX chain is as fast as 4 seconds per block, and the transaction processing reaches 3000TPS/S.
high.enough: Globalization & enough for any responsible business
high.ease: High ease of use & online support from technical team
high.postgreSQL: Use the high storage and high concurrency performance of PostgreSQL database to store system parameters in data tables, and use database engines such as views, indexes and stored procedures to improve data reading and writing ability.
high.team: "The IBAX team is composed of a group of technology geeks with innovative spirit.
high.never: We never 'follow the rules and stick to the rules', but constantly comprehensively adopt existing or our innovative technologies to improve the overall performance of the ibax chain."
high.to: Enough to satisfy any responsible business
high.provide: technical team to provide online support
high.storage: The maximum storage capacity of the block is up to 64M
high.etc: The casting node is a distributed network service node in the IBAX platform, which provides the function of token casting for the entire network, and has the responsibility of guarding network security and increasing the cost of network attacks.
high.reward: The reward mechanism of minting nodes is the basic condition for maintaining the stability of the IBAX platform. We use a simple and practical probabilistic algorithm: casting probability = casting node computing power / network computing power. Over time, the probability of each minting node getting rewards is the same, which helps maintain the stability of the minting node.
high.running: Foundry nodes running all over the world not only serve as mining incentive nodes to maintain network security, but also exist independently as distributed servers, and provide decentralized services for various ecological libraries (ecoLib), such as decentralization Social tools, decentralized network services, etc.
high.node: The child node is the first in the entire blockchain world. It only retains data related to transactions with its own ecological (ecoLib) application module, and the full amount of data is borne by honor nodes, guardian nodes and casting nodes. In addition, child nodes can also interact with "private data" to ensure the privacy, security, and flexibility of transactions.
high.can: The child node can only retain the transaction data related to its own ecological application, and the child node can also execute its own independent ecology (ecoLib) from the network of other nodes. Therefore, we also call the child node a side chain.
high.of: CLB is a node independent of the IBAX network, and at the same time has the function of an Oracle.
high.runs: CLB runs as an independent node and does not affect the performance of the master node. It can flexibly configure CLB performance and deployment according to business requirements, and has independent smart contracts, operation interfaces, and database tables.
high.meet: CLB is designed to meet the needs of cross-chain. Through CLB's own data reading function and asset locking and conversion of smart contracts, external assets can be turned into assets in the IBAX ecosystem. CLB can also process and format data. Used by IBAX network.
high.virtual: The IBAX virtual machine can simultaneously support: Ethereum and Binance Chain smart contracts. You can import the contract with one click and seamlessly connect to the IBAX ecosystem.
high.most: Compatible with the most widely used smart contract engine
high.one: One-click import of smart contracts from other chains
high.contract: Multiple contract types: delay contract, trigger contract...
high.simple: Simple and easy-to-use online contract editor
high.basic: "IBAX is a basic blockchain framework that can support global complex businesses. It is very important for us to provide good compatibility for developers of other chains."
high.from: One-click import of smart contracts from other blockchains
high.divides: The IBAX network divides nodes and transactions into fragments, and successfully increases the packaging efficiency by orders of magnitude through different consensus processing algorithms and multi-signature verification mechanisms.
resource.technical: We are committed to technical research
resource.committed: Use blockchain technology to change the status quo of society
resource.composed: IBAX is composed of a group of people from all over the world who love blockchain technology. We pursue the research of blockchain technology to the practical application, and constantly explore the cutting-edge knowledge of blockchain. Provide a mature and stable blockchain platform for all approved teams to join us.
resource.needs: Technology needs to solve practical problems for humans. We hope to create a decentralized and autonomous platform through the concept of blockchain decentralization. You can shop, consume, travel, etc. here, and do whatever you want without worrying about data. Leakage, asset security, privacy issues, because these data will be kept by you and authorized by yourself.

resourse.compatible: These applications are compatible with IBAX contracts and complete ecological deployment with one click
resourse.name: Ecological name
resourse.gain: What will you gain from using IBAX
resourse.problems: These problems are real problems faced by developers, and you will easily face them through IBAX.
resourse.every: Every development team hopes to use the least manpower to complete their own ideas. IBAX network will provide you with complete development documents. You can create the ecological application you want to name here. At the same time, the online BaaS system we provide also supports smart contracts. Online editing.
resourse.noticed: We have noticed that many excellent development teams have been hit hard by the high transaction fees of certain chains. The BAX network has the characteristics of high execution efficiency and high block capacity, so transaction costs in the IBAX wide network are extremely low.
resourse.follow: Follow news content and learn more about IBAX content
resourse.explanation: Learn about IBAX with video explanation
resourse.video: Video introduction of the IBAX team
solutions.make: Make every original worthy of respect
solutions.protection: The IBAX copyright protection platform provides a one-stop online copyright protection solution for work content production organizations or content operation companies that integrates rights storage, communication monitoring, electronic evidence collection, and judicial rights protection litigation.
solutions.reduce: Reduce costs and increase efficiency for the industry
solutions.quick: Quick confirmation of rights and registration tools. Based on the characteristics of the block chain, the realization of "publishing is confirming the right", 1 minute to get the traditional 7-30 days of work. The right holder's identity information, registered content unique ID (hash value), registration time and other information are safely chained.
solutions.integrate: Integrate dispersed business links into an online one-stop service, integrating rights storage, communication monitoring, electronic forensics, and rights protection services, so that original authors/organizations can achieve copyright protection "without running at once".
solutions.precision: High-precision network-wide monitoring tool. Based on DNA traceability technology, the original works are stamped with "identity stamps", with a search capability of 100 million in milliseconds, accurate identification of infringements in the entire network, monitoring at any time, independent setting of monitoring scope and annual service.
solutions.costs: Reduce costs and increase efficiency for the industry
solutions.trustworthy: Create a trustworthy copyright ecological alliance, share related information on the chain, realize integration and data exchange in the smart contract and business application layer, and realize fair and real-time income distribution through smart contracts.
solutions.service: The supply chain financial service platform digitally upgrades the accounts receivable of core enterprises, so that the accounts receivable can be used as credit certificates, circulated in the supply chain and passed to upstream suppliers, thereby solving small and micro enterprises at the end of the supply chain The problem of expensive financing and difficult financing. At the same time, based on financial-level identity security and transaction security certification, it also provides a complete solution for enterprise online zero-touch transactions.
solutions.digital: Digital asset full life cycle management
solutions.credit: Based on bank credit, core enterprises can confirm the online rights of the accounts payable of tier-one suppliers and put them on the chain. Tier 1 suppliers can transfer accounts receivable to Tier 2 or multi-tier suppliers on the chain.
solutions.fully: It is fully open to banks, factoring, guarantees, trusts and other financial institutions, as well as core enterprises and suppliers upstream and downstream of the supply chain.
solutions.build: Co-build a supply chain financial collaboration ecology based on blockchain. And welcome large and powerful banks to join the blockchain alliance to build together. The entire life cycle of accounts receivable digital assets are on the chain, and the generation, circulation, financing, and destruction of digital assets are directly completed on the chain. Eliminate the problem of double spending and inconsistency in reconciliation that are common in non-blockchain systems.
solutions.suppliers: Suppliers at all levels can transfer the accounts receivable held in the chain to the capital, and receive cash receipts in advance.
solutions.assist: Assist core companies to achieve supply chain penetration management
solutions.after: After the core company pays, the clearing agency cooperating with ibax will settle the funds to the chain holders of the accounts receivable, including all levels of suppliers and investors.
solutions.credible: A flexible, credible, and diversified asset management platform based on the blockchain helps enterprises to put the underlying assets on the chain, realize the penetrating management of asset packaging and authorization on the chain, and continuously track the asset situation through the risk control on the chain to help the asset Contract issuance lowers the financing threshold for companies with weak credit but high-quality assets.
solutions.management: Automatic asset management on the chain
solutions.including: Including assets real-time on-chain deposit certificates, on-chain asset confirmation, automatic asset authorization, asset decision management, asset risk control analysis.
solutions.risk: The asset risk control analysis engine on the second-level chain helps penetrating insight into the underlying asset details,
solutions.structured: Make structured assets more transparent and credible.
solutions.realize: Realize asset transaction structure design based on smart contracts, automatic contract issuance, recurring asset purchase, and asset replacement capabilities.
solutions.second: Second-level asset penetration and credit enhancement
solutions.relying: Relying on the blockchain account and verification system, it realizes one-stop services such as online signing, collection and payment, which helps capitalists to see the process of asset formation and helps enterprises obtain lower-cost funds.
develope.ecoLib: How to Create a New ecoLib ? EcoLib creation is fast with LESS. The creator has all the management permissions.
develope.bass: BaaS function has been added to Weaver, you can use it to create and manage your ecology.
develope.technology: The IBAX team is technology-led and is very interested in all R&D issues. We will reply to the questions in the community in a timely manner.
develope.use: 1. Documents on the use of the IBAX chain.
develope.can: You can find related questions here. If you can’t solve them, you must ask questions in time, and other developers in the community will give you the answers you want in time.
develope.open: Open to developers, submit smart contracts to the BaaS market to get benefits
develope.has: IBAX has opened up the BaaS application platform for developers. After submitting the solution and obtaining the approval of the audit team, they will receive certain rewards. The form of the reward is set by the developer.
develope.there: There are three charging modes for the solution you submit:
develope.fees: 1. Deduction for installation and use. This is a one-time deduction mechanism, deducting the user's installation and use fees.
develope.deducted: 2. Fees are deducted during the use process, and fees are deducted when using this solution in the app. This is a continuous deduction.
develope.deduction: 3. Combination deduction, deduct a certain fee during installation, and still deduct a certain fee every time you use this solution.
develope.review: The IBAX code review team will conduct security reviews of all smart contracts submitted to the BaaS market to ensure the safety of each user and the benefits of developers.
develope.code: Low Code is extremely friendly to all developers. For this reason, the IBAX team provides a Low Code development platform, which we call "Weaver".
develope.quickly: In Weaver, you can quickly create an ecology through the visualization page, and initialize the ecological rules by selecting the configuration method. Members who join the ecology will have to abide by your ecological rules.
develope.also: Weaver also supports one-click import of contracts from other chains for visual operation. If you are a mature ecological developer, you can use this function to seamlessly reference your ecology on other chains.
develope.frameworks: The online smart contract editor provides contract frameworks and templates to help developers quickly develop ecological contracts.
develope.means: Saving means uploading to the chain. After the written contract is successfully saved, you can choose to publish it to the chain and apply it to the ecology.
develope.drag: Provide drag-and-drop effects to add controls, reduce repetitive development work, and reduce the amount of code.
develope.number: A large number of basic templates have been added to Weaver, such as voting templates, message templates, BaaS applications, member management, etc. These templates can be directly added to your ecology through the visualization page.
about.can: You can talk to us in the following ways
about.have: We have social accounts on all media platforms, you can follow us, leave a message and interact with us
about.our: Our announcement of project progress and blockchain insights
about.events: Release events and blockchain news related content
about.an: An important release channel for video resources
about.you: You can also join in the following ways:
about.want: Want answers to technical questions? Go to technical forum
